OCRHardware.Processor: 2.0+ GHz processor with minimum dual cores
OCRHardware.DiskSpace: 20 MB temporary disk space for each PDF file being processed – multiply by the maximum projected number of concurrent OCR sessions
OCRHardware.Notes: PDF/Word comparison requires OCR. OCR and text extraction are CPU- and disk-intensive.

SupportedEnvironments.Notes: Unless otherwise stated, all environments are the English version with the en-us language set.
OperatingSystems: Microsoft Windows 11 (64-bit) - 21H2 and above with .NET Framework 4.8.1 installed (22H2 and above include .NET Framework 4.8.1)
Microsoft Windows 10 (32-bit and 64-bit) - 20H2 and above with .NET Framework 4.8.1 installed

Citrix.Notes: Check with your Citrix vendor about which Windows operating system supports your version of Citrix.

Notes: If Litera Compare 11.13.0 is being installed on the same computer as Metadact, Metadact must be version 5.19.0 or later.

Litera Compare can only be installed in a Windows environment. If you’re a Mac user, you can use a third-party vendor application like Parallels Desktop or VMware Fusion to emulate Windows and then install Litera Compare in the emulator. However, Litera Compare is not compatible with Mac Mini M1 running Parallels Desktop.

DMSIntegration.Notes: Check with your Document Management System (DMS) vendor about which Windows operating system supports your DMS.
NetDocuments: ndOffice must be installed to use the Litera NetDocuments integration.
